body_html:
Please change the implementation to just do

  auto ret = onnxifi_load(
      ONNXIFI_LOADER_FLAG_VERSION_1_0, nullptr, nullptr, &lib);

for loading ONNXIFI. Recoding paths to ONNXIFI library in the op makes it non-portable even to other machines with the same ONNXIFI implementations. To choose a backend, we should use
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2.proto#L132-L149. For the proof-of-concept, lets just choose the first backend for now.

for loading ONNXIFI. Recoding paths to ONNXIFI library in the op makes it non-portable even to other machines with the same ONNXIFI implementations. To choose a backend, we should use
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2.proto#L132-L149. For the proof-of-concept, lets just choose the first backend for now.
body:
Please change the implementation to just do
```
  auto ret = onnxifi_load(
      ONNXIFI_LOADER_FLAG_VERSION_1_0, nullptr, nullptr, &lib);
```
for loading ONNXIFI. Recoding paths to ONNXIFI library in the op makes it non-portable even to other machines with the same ONNXIFI implementations. To choose a backend, we should use
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2.proto#L132-L149. For the proof-of-concept, lets just choose the first backend for now.
